info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 27 at 2:23PM MDT until August 27 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Denver CO
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...West central Weld County.
* WHEN...Until 530 PM MDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
- At 222 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen.
- Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding.
- Some locations that will experience flooding include... Northern Greeley, Windsor, Eaton, Severance, Ault, New Windsor Reservoir and Black Hollow Reservoir.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON
